id.description: Identifier of the individual line item

action.description: The action to be carried out on the Service. Can be: add, modify, delete, noChange

state.description: State of the order item: described in the state machine diagram. This is the requested state.

service.description: The Service to be acted on by the order item

appointment.description: An appointment that was set up with a related party for this order item

serviceOrderItemRelationship.description: A list of order items related to this order item
